name: Islom Zokirov
headline: Computer Science Student | Impact-Focused Software Development
about: I am a senior student at Presidential School in Samarkand, Uzbekistan, with a strong background in mathematics and computer science. I aim to develop software and applications that protect public health and improve lives. My long-term goal is to integrate computer science with environmental sustainability. Through my studies and projects, I focus on practical solutions that create meaningful impact.
